mapper.insert: INSERT INTO raffle_activity_account_month (user_id, activity_id, month, month_count, month_count_surplus, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{activityId}, #{month}, #{monthCount}, #{monthCountSurplus}, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE month_count = month_count + VALUES(month_count), month_count_surplus = month_count_surplus + VALUES(month_count_surplus), update_time = NOW()
